cv.description: Download my full resume to learn more about my education, experience and skills.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Young, motivated and enthusiastic professional seeking opportunities to start and develop her career.

technical.title: Technical knowledge
technical.description: Intermediate level in Java, PHP, SQL and JavaScript, with experience in practical projects and functional web applications.

passion.title: Passion for technology
passion.description: Passionate about technology and eager to apply theoretical knowledge and practical skills to contribute to the success of innovative organizations.

learning.title: Quick learning
learning.description: Great adaptability and quick learning capacity, with excellent performance in dynamic and changing work environments.

problem.title: Problem solving
problem.description: Ability for problem solving and critical thinking to face challenges with creativity and efficiency.

communication.title: Effective communication
communication.description: Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, and ease for teamwork and collaboration.

pokemon.title: Pokémon Cards Gallery
pokemon.description: Web application to view and explore a collection of Pokémon cards with details and features of each one.

piano.title: Interactive Virtual Piano
piano.description: A fully functional virtual piano developed with React, which allows you to play melodies using the keyboard or mouse.

chat.title: Real-time Chat
chat.description: Chat application developed in Java using sockets for real-time communication between multiple users.
